sources.title: Essential Killing (ACTION THRILLER Filme Deutsch komplett, Actionfilme in voller LÃ¤nge auf Deutsch)

metadata.Plot: A Taliban member who lives in Afghanistan is taken captive by the Americans after killing an American soldier and two contractors. He is transferred to Europe for interrogation but manages to escape from his captors and becomes an escaped convict on a continent he does not know.
metadata.Writer: Jerzy Skolimowski, Ewa Piaskowska, James McManus
metadata.Actors: Vincent Gallo, Emmanuelle Seigner, Zach Cohen
metadata.Country: Poland, Norway, Ireland, Hungary, United Kingdom
